question: Please text me when you arrived at home ___ I know you are safe
Read your text silently ____ disturb the others
I will go to the university ____ continue my studies
Some countries need you to have visa ___ enter the country

Emma: Tom, stop reading comics. You have an assignment for tomorrow.
Tom: I don`t think so. I finished it yesterday.
Emma: No. It`s a new assignment.
Tom: Really?
Emma: Yes. Hurry up and finish it so that you can read the comics again.
What does Emma`s last sentence mean?

answerOptions.answer: If Tom finishes reading the comic, he can work on his assignment.
Emma helped To finish a new assignment.
If Tom finishes the assignment, he can continue to read the comics.
